19000481.en:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>Here we are! So this is Mogare Camp!
It's so far away, I was so surprised!
Thanks, Sis!<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000481.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>「着いた　着いた！　ここが　モガレキャンプか！
　けっこう　遠いから　ビックリしちゃった！
　お姉ちゃん　ありがとね！<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000481.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>: 도착, 도착했어! 여기가 모가레 야영지구나!
　생각보다 멀어서 깜짝 놀랐네!
　고마워, 누나!<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000481.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>到啦到啦！这里就是摩加雷营地啊！
真没想到居然这么远！
大姐姐，谢谢你啦！<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000481.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>到啦到啦！這裡就是摩加雷營地啊！
真沒想到居然這麼遠！
大姊姊，謝謝你啦！<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000482.en:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>Here we are! So this is Mogare Camp!
It's so far away, I was so surprised!
Thank you, big brother!<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000482.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>「着いた　着いた！　ここが　モガレキャンプか！
　けっこう　遠いから　ビックリしちゃった！
　お兄ちゃん　ありがとね！<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000482.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>: 도착, 도착했어! 여기가 모가레 야영지구나!
　생각보다 멀어서 깜짝 놀랐네!
　고마워, 형!<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000482.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>到啦到啦！这里就是摩加雷营地啊！
真没想到居然这么远！
大哥哥，谢谢你啦！<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000482.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>到啦到啦！這裡就是摩加雷營地啊！
真沒想到居然這麼遠！
大哥哥，謝謝你啦！<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21077.en: <start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>I wonder where Sage Broggen is.<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21077.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>「さーて　賢者ブロッゲンさまは
　どこにいるのかな……。<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21077.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>: 음~ 현자 브록겐 님은
　어디 계시려나…….<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21077.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>哎，贤者布罗根大人
到底在哪呢……？<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21077.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>哎，賢者布羅根大人
到底在哪呢……？<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21078.en:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>Oh, there he is! There he is! It's
Sage Broggen!<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21078.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>「あっ！　いたぞ！
　賢者ブロッゲンさまだー！<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21078.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>: 앗! 저기 있다!
　현자 브록겐 님이야!<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21078.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>啊！找到了！
贤者布罗根大人！<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21078.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>啊！找到了！
賢者布羅根大人！<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21079.ja: <start_lip_sync n00511 _normal m00001>「ブロッゲンさまだー！<stop_lip_animation n00511 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21079.ko: <start_lip_sync n00511 _normal m00001>: 브록겐 님이다!<stop_lip_animation n00511 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21079.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00511 _normal m00001>布罗根大人！<stop_lip_animation n00511 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21079.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00511 _normal m00001>布羅根大人！<stop_lip_animation n00511 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21080.en:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>Why are you doing this? These children
are..!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21080.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「な　な　なんでアーールか！？
　この　子供たちはっ！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21080.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 뭐뭐, 뭐냐~~!?
　이 아이들은!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21080.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>什、什么情况是也？！
这些孩子哪来的？！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21080.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>什、什麼情況是也！？
這些小孩子哪來的！？<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

32292.en:
<start_lip_sync n01206 _normal m00001>Hohoho. How cute. I'm sure that
Broggen's cane is very rare.<stop_lip_animation n01206 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32292.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01206 _normal m00001>「ホホホ。かわいらしい。
　きっと　ブロッゲンさまの杖さまが
　めずらしいのですわ。<stop_lip_animation n01206 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32292.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01206 _normal m00001>: 호호호, 귀여워라.
　분명히 브록겐 님의 지팡이가
　신기해서 그런 걸 거예요.<stop_lip_animation n01206 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32292.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01206 _normal m00001>呵呵呵，真可爱。
一定是觉得布罗根大人的手杖
很稀奇吧。<stop_lip_animation n01206 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32292.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01206 _normal m00001>呵呵呵，真可愛。
一定是覺得布羅根大人的法杖大人
很稀奇吧。<stop_lip_animation n01206 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21082.en:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>You're Agrani boys, aren't you? It's
not safe for you to come all this way!
Who are your parents?<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21082.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「キミたち　アグラニの子だね！？
　こんな所まで来て　危ないでしょ！
　いったい　親は……。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21082.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 너희 아그라니의 아이들이지!?
　이런 곳까지 오면 어떡해, 위험하잖느냐!
　대체 부모는…….<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21082.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>你们是阿古拉尼镇的孩子吧？！
居然跑到这里来，很危险啊！
你们的父母呢……？<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21082.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>你們是阿古拉尼鎮的孩子吧！？
居然跑到這裡來，很危險啊！
你們的父母呢……？<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21083.en:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>Wow, he's talking, he's talking! Look,
Kokon! The tip is flapping! A voice is
coming from over there!<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21083.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>「うわー　しゃべってる　しゃべってる！
　見ろ　ココン！　先っちょが　パカパカしてる！
　あそこから　声がするぞ！<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21083.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>: 우와, 말했다! 말했어!
　저것 봐, 코콘! 윗부분이 달칵달칵 움직여!
　저기서 목소리가 나!<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21083.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>哇！说话了，说话了！
你看，空空！杖头一开一合的！
声音是从那里发出来的！<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21083.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>哇！說話了，說話了！
妳看，可康！杖頭一開一闔的！
聲音是從那裡發出來的！<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21084.en:
<start_lip_sync n00511 _normal m00001>Yay! Tell me more stories! Let me see
what's going on inside!<stop_lip_animation n00511 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21084.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00511 _normal m00001>「わーい！　もっと　おはなししてー！
　なか　どうなってるか　みせてー！<stop_lip_animation n00511 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21084.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00511 _normal m00001>: 와아! 더 얘기해 봐!
　안쪽은 어떻게 생겼는지 보여 줘!<stop_lip_animation n00511 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21084.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00511 _normal m00001>哇！你继续说话嘛！
让我们看看里面是什么样子！<stop_lip_animation n00511 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21084.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00511 _normal m00001>哇！你繼續說話嘛！
讓我們看看裡面是什麼樣子！<stop_lip_animation n00511 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21085.en:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>Inside? What do you mean inside? What
do I do? Broggen is sleeping soundly
today.<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21085.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「中？　中って　なんのこと！？
　どうしよう！　ブロッゲンさまは
　今日も　ぐっすり　お休みだし……。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21085.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 안쪽? 안쪽이라니 무슨 소리냐!?
　미치겠군! 브록겐 님은
　오늘도 세상모르고 주무시고 계시니…….<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21085.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>里面？什么里面？！
这下该怎么办？布罗根大人
今天也在呼呼大睡……<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21085.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>裡面？什麼裡面！？
這下該怎麼辦？布羅根大人
今天也在呼呼大睡……<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21086.ja: <start_lip_sync n00328 _normal m00001>「ぐう　ぐう……。<stop_lip_animation n00328 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21086.ko: <start_lip_sync n00328 _normal m00001>: 쿨…… 쿨…….<stop_lip_animation n00328 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21087.en:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>Hey, hey, why is Lady Broggen always
asleep? Why does Mr. Cane talk
instead?<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21087.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>「ねえねえ　なんで　ブロッゲンさまは
　いつも　眠ってるの？
　どうして　代わりに　杖さんがしゃべるの？<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21087.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>: 있잖아, 브록겐 님은
　왜 항상 주무시는 거야?
　왜 지팡이님이 대신 말하는 거야?<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21087.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>我问你哦，为什么布罗根大人
老是在睡觉？
为什么是手杖在代替他说话？<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21087.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>我問你喔，為什麼布羅根大人
老是在睡覺？
為什麼是法杖在代替他說話？<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21088.en:
<start_lip_sync n00511 _normal m00001>Where was the staff born? Does he have
a name? Why does he talk in a strange
way?<stop_lip_animation n00511 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21088.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00511 _normal m00001>「つえさんは　どこで　うまれたの？
　おなまえって　あるの？
　ヘンな　しゃべりかたなのは　なんで？<stop_lip_animation n00511 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21088.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00511 _normal m00001>: 지팡이님은 어디서 태어났어?
　이름은 뭐야?
　말투는 왜 그렇게 이상한 거야?<stop_lip_animation n00511 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21088.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00511 _normal m00001>你是在哪里出生的？
有名字吗？
为什么说话方式那么奇怪？<stop_lip_animation n00511 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21088.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00511 _normal m00001>你是在哪裡出生的？
有名字嗎？
為什麼說話方式那麼奇怪？<stop_lip_animation n00511 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21089.en:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>Ahh! I wish you wouldn't ask so many
questions at the same time!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21089.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「あー！　同時に　たくさん
　質問しないでほしいでアーーール！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21089.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 아악! 한꺼번에
　질문을 쏟아내지 말란 말이니~라!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21089.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>哎哟！拜托你们不要一下子
问这么多问题是也！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21089.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>哎喲！拜託你們不要一下子
問這麼多問題是也！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

31636.en: <start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>Help Me! Arue in!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31636.ja: <start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「誰かー　ヘルプミー！　でアールー……！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31636.ko: <start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 누가 좀 헬프 미!이니~라……!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31636.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>来人啊！救救我！是也……！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31636.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>來人啊！救救我！是也……！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21090.en:
The conversation between sageBroggen's
Staff, Nutsy and Kokon continued until
they were both bored.
21090.ja:
こうして　賢者ブロッゲンの杖と
ナツィと　ココンの会話は
ふたりが飽きるまで　続いた。
21090.ko:
이렇게 현자 브록겐의 지팡이와
나츠이, 코콘의 대화는
두 사람이 흥미를 잃을 때까지 계속되었다.
21090.zh-Hans:
就这样，贤者布罗根的手杖
陪着纳奇和空空聊天，
直到他们厌烦为止。
21090.zh-Hant:
就這樣，賢者布羅根的法杖
陪著納奇和可康聊天，
直到他們厭煩為止。

21091.en:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>Ah! That was fun. I talked a lot with
Mr. Cane.<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21091.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>「……あー！　面白かった。
　杖さんと　いっぱい　お話ししちゃった。<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21091.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>: ……아~! 재미있었어.
　지팡이님이랑 실컷 얘기했네.<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21091.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>……啊！真有趣，
和手杖聊了好多。<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21091.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>……啊！真有趣，
和法杖聊了好多。<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21092.en:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>Hey, hey, Sage Broggen. Sage, do you
have a spare of this cane or
something?<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21092.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>「ねえねえ　賢者ブロッゲンさま。
　賢者さまは　この杖のスペアとか
　持ってるんでしょ？<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21092.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>: 있잖아요, 현자 브록겐 님.
　현자님은 여분 지팡이 같은 것도
　갖고 계시죠?<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21092.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>贤者布罗根大人，
您应该有这把手杖的替代品吧？<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21092.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>賢者布羅根大人，
您應該有這把法杖的替代品吧？<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21093.en: <start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>So, uh, hand me this cane.<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21093.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>「だからさ
　この杖　ボクに　ちょうだ……<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21093.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>: 그러니까
　이 지팡이는 저한테 주세……<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21093.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>所以，
能不能把这把手杖送给我……<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21093.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>所以，
能不能把這把法杖送給我……<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21094.en: <start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>Don't touch the stick!<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21094.ja: <start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「杖に　さわるでないッ！！<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21094.ko: <start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: 지팡이에 손대지 말거라!!<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21094.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>别碰手杖！！<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21094.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>別碰法杖！！<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21095.en:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>This is not something innocent
children like yourselves should be
allowed to touch!<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21095.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「これは　お前たちのような
　無垢な子供が　触れてよいものではない！<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21095.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: 이건 너희처럼 순진무구한 아이들이
　건드려서는 안 되는 물건이다!<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21095.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>这不是你们这些
纯洁的孩子能碰的东西！<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21095.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>這不是你們這些
純潔的小孩子能碰的東西！<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21096.en: <start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>This staff is made of my sins.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21096.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「この杖は　わしの犯した
　罪で　できておるのだ……。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21096.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: 이 지팡이는 내가 저지른
　죄로 이루어져 있다…….<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21096.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>这把杖是我用
犯下的罪孽制成的……<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21096.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>這把法杖是我用
犯下的罪孽製造而成的……<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

32293.en:
<start_lip_sync n01206 _normal m00001>Well, don't be so angry. The children
are surprised, too.<stop_lip_animation n01206 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32293.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01206 _normal m00001>「ま…まあ　そう怒りませんでも……。
　子供たちも　ビックリしておりますわ。<stop_lip_animation n01206 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32293.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01206 _normal m00001>: 브… 브록겐 님, 그렇게 화내지 마세요…….
　아이들도 놀랐잖아요.<stop_lip_animation n01206 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32293.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01206 _normal m00001>哦……嗯，不用这么生气啊……
孩子们也都吓到了。<stop_lip_animation n01206 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32293.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01206 _normal m00001>喔……嗯，不用這麼生氣啊……
孩子們也都嚇到了。<stop_lip_animation n01206 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21098.en:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>Thank you for your hospitality,
Sister. Well then, I'll be going.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21098.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「……シスター　世話になったな。
　それでは　わしは　行くよ。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21098.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: ……수녀님, 신세가 많았네.
　그럼 난 이만 실례하지.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21098.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>……修女，谢谢你的照顾，
那我走了。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21098.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>……修女，謝謝妳的照顧，
那我走了。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

32294.en:
<start_lip_sync n01206 _normal m00001>Yes, take care. By the way, why did
you return from your trip to ''spin'' to
see what's going on in the world?<stop_lip_animation n01206 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32294.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01206 _normal m00001>「はい　お気をつけて。……ところで
　世界の様子を見てまわると言って　旅立たれた
　あなたさまが　なぜ　また戻られたのです？<stop_lip_animation n01206 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32294.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01206 _normal m00001>: 네, 조심해서 가세요. ……그런데
　세상을 돌아보겠다며 여행을 떠나시더니
　왜 다시 돌아오신 건가요?<stop_lip_animation n01206 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32294.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01206 _normal m00001>好的，请小心……对了，
你说要出去看看世界而踏上旅程，
为什么现在又回来了呢？<stop_lip_animation n01206 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32294.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01206 _normal m00001>好的，請小心……對了，
你說要出去看看世界，而踏上
旅程，為什麼現在又回來了呢？<stop_lip_animation n01206 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21100.en:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>Hmmm. I've heard some disturbing
rumors on the wind. Sister, don't go
out carelessly.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21100.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「ふむ……。風のウワサに
　気がかりなことを　耳にしたのでな……。
　シスターも　不用意に　出歩かんことだ。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21100.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: 흠…….
　조금 마음에 걸리는 소문을 들어서 말일세…….
　수녀님도 부주의하게 돌아다니지 마시게나.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21100.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>嗯……我听到了
让人有点担心的传闻……
修女，你最好也不要随便外出。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21100.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>嗯……我聽到了
讓人有點擔心的傳聞……
修女，妳最好也不要隨便外出。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21101.ja: <start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「では　さらばだ。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21101.ko: <start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: 그럼 잘 지내시게.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21101.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>那么，再见了。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21101.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>那麼，再見了。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21102.en:
Hmmm. He seems to be quite a skilled traveler. I see. So you are , are you? You're the one
who brought the children, aren't you?
21102.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「ふむ。なかなか　ウデの立つ旅人のようだ。
　……そうか。<pc>というのか。
　子供たちを連れてきたのは　お前だな？<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21102.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: 흠, 제법 실력 있는 여행자인 것 같군.
　……그래, {pc}|hpp(이란,란) 말이지.
　아이들을 데려온 게 자네로군?<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21102.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>嗯，这位旅行者身手真不错。
这样啊，你叫<pc>。
是你把孩子们带来的吗？<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21102.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>嗯，這位旅行者身手真不錯。
這樣啊，你叫做<pc>。
是你把孩子們帶來的嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21103.en:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>Oh <pc>. It's been a while.
You brought the kids?<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21103.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「おお　<pc>ではないか。
　しばらくぶりだな。
　お前が　子供たちを連れてきたのか？<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21103.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: 오오, <pc> 아닌가.
　오랜만이군.
　자네가 아이들을 데려온 건가?<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21103.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>哦，这不是<pc>吗？
有一阵子没见了，
是你把孩子们带来的吗？<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21103.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>喔，這不是<pc>嗎？
有一陣子沒見了，
是你把孩子們帶來的嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21104.en:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>A child's upright heart is sometimes
cruel. Whenever I face it, I feel as
if my heart is being gouged out.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21104.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「……子供の　まっすぐな心は　ときに残酷だ。
　それに直面するたびに　わしは
　心を　えぐりとられるような気分になる……。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21104.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: ……아이들의 순수함은 때론 잔인해.
　그 순수함을 마주할 때마다
　나는 가슴이 찢어지는 것만 같다네…….<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21104.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>……孩子直来直往的性情有时很残酷。
每次面对他们，
我就会心如刀割……<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21104.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>……小孩子直來直往的性情有時很殘酷。
每次面對他們，
我就會感到心如刀割……<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21105.en:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>I'll see you again when I get a
chance. See you soon.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21105.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「機会があったら　いずれ　また会おう。
　ではな……。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21105.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: 기회가 되면 언젠가 또 보세.
　그럼…….<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21105.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>有缘再见吧，
告辞……<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21105.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>有緣再見吧，
告辭……<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21106.en:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>I think I got a little overzealous.
I've offended Mr. Broggen.<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21106.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>「……ボク　ちょっと
　調子に乗りすぎちゃったかな……。
　ブロッゲンさまを　怒らせちゃった。<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21106.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>: ……내가 너무 까불었나……?
　브록겐 님이 화를 내시다니.<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21106.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>……我是不是
太得意忘形了……？
才会惹布罗根大人生气。<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21106.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>……我是不是
太得意忘形了……？
才會惹布羅根大人生氣。<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21107.en:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>I had no idea that the cane was so
important to Broggen.<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21107.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>「あの杖が　ブロッゲンさまにとって
　そんなに大事なものだったなんて
　思わなかったよ……。<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21107.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>: 그 지팡이가 브록겐 님께
　그렇게 소중한 물건인 줄은 몰랐어…….<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21107.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>没想到那把杖
对布罗根大人那么重要……<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21107.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>沒想到那把法杖
對布羅根大人那麼重要……<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000483.en:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001><pc>'s big sister. Thank you
for bringing me here! I'll thank you
for it, so come on down to Agrani.<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000483.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>「<pc>の　お姉ちゃん。
　ここまで連れてきてくれて　ありがとう！
　お礼をするから　アグラニまで来てね。<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000483.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>: <pc> 누나.
　여기까지 데려다줘서 고마워!
　사례할 테니까 아그라니로 와 주라.<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000483.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001><pc>大姐姐。
谢谢你把我们送到这里！
我会好好答谢你的，到阿古拉尼镇来吧。<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000483.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001><pc>大姊姊，
謝謝你把我們送到這裡！
我會好好答謝你的，記得來阿古拉尼一趟喔。<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000484.en:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001><pc>'s big brother. Thank you
for bringing me here! Come on down to
Agrani so I can thank you.<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000484.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>「<pc>の　お兄ちゃん。
　ここまで連れてきてくれて　ありがとう！
　お礼をするから　アグラニまで来てね。<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000484.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001>: <pc> 형.
　여기까지 데려다줘서 고마워!
　사례할 테니까 아그라니로 와 주라.<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000484.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001><pc>大哥哥。
谢谢你把我们送到这里！
我会好好答谢你的，到阿古拉尼镇来吧。<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000484.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00510 _normal m00001><pc>大哥哥，
謝謝你把我們送到這裡！
我會好好答謝你的，記得來阿古拉尼一趟喔。<stop_lip_animation n00510 CLOSE_MOUTH>
